## Classes Index

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub">ControlFlowHub</a></>}>
Given a set of branch descriptors &#91;BB, Succ0, Succ1&#93;, create a &quot;hub&quot; such that the control flow from each BB to a successor is now split into two edges, one from BB to the hub and another from the hub to the successor. <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor">BranchDescriptor</a></>}>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Utilities to manipulate the CFG and restore SSA for the new control flow.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#ifndef LLVM&#95;TRANSFORMS&#95;UTILS&#95;CONTROLFLOWUTILS&#95;H</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#define LLVM&#95;TRANSFORMS&#95;UTILS&#95;CONTROLFLOWUTILS&#95;H</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/smallvector-h">llvm/ADT/SmallVector.h</a>&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/stringref-h">llvm/ADT/StringRef.h</a>&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">namespace </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm">llvm</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreeupdater">DomTreeUpdater</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Given a set of branch descriptors &#91;BB, Succ0, Succ1&#93;, create a &quot;hub&quot; such</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="comment">/// that the control flow from each BB to a successor is now split into two</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="comment">/// edges, one from BB to the hub and another from the hub to the successor. The</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="comment">/// hub consists of a series of guard blocks, one for each outgoing block. Each</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="comment">/// guard block conditionally branches to the corresponding outgoing block, or</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the next guard block in the chain. These guard blocks are returned in the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="comment">/// argument vector.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This also updates any PHINodes in the successor. For each such PHINode, the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="comment">/// operands corresponding to incoming blocks are moved to a new PHINode in the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="comment">/// hub, and the hub is made an operand of the original PHINode.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Note that for some block BB with a conditional branch, it is not necessary</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="comment">/// that both successors are rerouted. The client specifies this by setting</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="comment">/// either Succ0 or Succ1 to nullptr, in which case, the corresponding successor</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="comment">/// is not rerouted.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Input CFG:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="comment">/// ----------</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="comment">///                    Def</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="comment">///                     |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="comment">///                     v</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="comment">///           In1      In2</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="comment">///            |        |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="comment">///            |        |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="comment">///            v        v</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="comment">///  Foo ---&gt; Out1     Out2</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="comment">///                     |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="comment">///                     v</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="comment">///                    Use</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Create hub: Incoming = &#123;In1, In2&#125;, Outgoing = &#123;Out1, Out2&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="comment">/// ----------------------------------------------------------</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="comment">///             Def</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="comment">///              |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="comment">///              v</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="comment">///  In1        In2          Foo</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="comment">///   |    Hub   |            |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="comment">///   |    + - - | - - +      |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="comment">///   |    &#39;     v     &#39;      V</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="comment">///   +------&gt; Guard1 -----&gt; Out1</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="comment">///        &#39;     |     &#39;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="comment">///        &#39;     v     &#39;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="comment">///        &#39;   Guard2 -----&gt; Out2</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="comment">///        &#39;           &#39;      |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="comment">///        + - - - - - +      |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="comment">///                           v</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="comment">///                          Use</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Limitations:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="comment">/// -----------</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 1 This assumes that all terminators in the CFG are direct branches (the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="comment">///    &quot;br&quot; instruction). The presence of any other control flow such as</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="comment">///    indirectbr, switch or callbr will cause an assert.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 2 The updates to the PHINodes are not sufficient to restore SSA</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="comment">///    form. Consider a definition Def, its use Use, incoming block In2 and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="comment">///    outgoing block Out2, such that:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="comment">///    a. In2 is reachable from D or contains D.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="comment">///    b. U is reachable from Out2 or is contained in Out2.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="comment">///    c. U is not a PHINode if U is contained in Out2.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="comment">///    Clearly, Def dominates Out2 since the program is valid SSA. But when the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="comment">///    hub is introduced, there is a new path through the hub along which Use is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="comment">///    reachable from entry without passing through Def, and SSA is no longer</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="comment">///    valid. To fix this, we need to look at all the blocks post-dominated by</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="comment">///    the hub on the one hand, and dominated by Out2 on the other. This is left</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="comment">///    for the caller to accomplish, since each specific use of this function</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="comment">///    may have additional information which simplifies this fixup. For example,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="comment">///    see restoreSSA() in the UnifyLoopExits pass.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub">ControlFlowHub</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor/#a006f7967889c12cbebbeb5657b6d6a3a">BranchDescriptor</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor/#a1ec7584aaecc2d1f91cc5b9ef5393fc4"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor/#a1ec7584aaecc2d1f91cc5b9ef5393fc4">BB</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor/#a66dee10829b8ce701edee102a265fb36"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor/#a66dee10829b8ce701edee102a265fb36">Succ0</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor/#ae950cdc3262556e3cd2e05bec93cc27e"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor/#ae950cdc3262556e3cd2e05bec93cc27e">Succ1</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor/#a006f7967889c12cbebbeb5657b6d6a3a"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor/#a006f7967889c12cbebbeb5657b6d6a3a">BranchDescriptor</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor/#a1ec7584aaecc2d1f91cc5b9ef5393fc4">BB</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor/#a66dee10829b8ce701edee102a265fb36">Succ0</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor/#ae950cdc3262556e3cd2e05bec93cc27e">Succ1</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal">        : <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor/#a1ec7584aaecc2d1f91cc5b9ef5393fc4">BB</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor/#a1ec7584aaecc2d1f91cc5b9ef5393fc4">BB</a>), <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor/#a66dee10829b8ce701edee102a265fb36">Succ0</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor/#a66dee10829b8ce701edee102a265fb36">Succ0</a>), <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor/#ae950cdc3262556e3cd2e05bec93cc27e">Succ1</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor/#ae950cdc3262556e3cd2e05bec93cc27e">Succ1</a>) &#123;&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
